title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\GkeNodePoolConfig\GkeNodePoolAutoscalingConfig
name: GkeNodePoolAutoscalingConfig
description:
GkeNodePoolAutoscaling contains information the cluster autoscaler needs to adjust the size of the node pool to the current cluster usage.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.GkeNodePoolConfig.GkeNodePoolAutoscalingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.min_node_count
params.description: The minimum number of nodes in the NodePool. Must be >= 0 and <= max_node_count.

params.name: data.max_node_count
params.description: The maximum number of nodes in the NodePool. Must be >= min_node_count. Note: Quota must be sufficient to scale up the cluster.

methods.description:
